Class Review

java.lang.Object
questions.util.Review
public class Review extends Object
Represents a review of a question or answer

  • Constructor Details

    • Review

      public Review(int reviewId, String reviewerName, int qaText, String reviewText, boolean isAnswer)
      Constructs a new review
      Parameters:
      reviewId - The ID of this review in the database
      reviewerName - The name of the author
      qaText - The primary key of the question or answer being reviewed
      reviewText - The text of the review
      isAnswer - Is this a review of an answer?
